casebody.data:
James V. FARMER v. Tracy A. HAND, Warden, Kansas State Penitentiary, Lansing, Kansas. No. 6444. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Nov. 21, 1960. Carl H. Seeliger, Jr., Denver, Colo., for appellant. John Anderson, Jr., Atty. Gen., Charles N. Henson, Jr., Asst. Atty. Gen., and J. Richard Foth, Asst. Atty. Gen., State of Kansas, for appellee.

Before MURRAH, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
